context: Are you interested in seeing a good movie

Whatever you know more i liked Get Out (2017) and i think it is a horror movie
i also liked Click (2010) which was made by Adan Sandlar Sandler, sorry. What is that movie about?
Yeah, i could enjoy that movie a lot!

I guess so, well thank you for your time I will try that movie, have a nice day Good bye
resp: You're welcome. So I would recommend Click (2010) I would also recommend Home Alone (1990) Good bye
